forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 64F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 19C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
